turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks nearest me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I found a Starbucks 2 blocks away on Montague and River Oaks, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Caramel Machiatto.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size Iced Caramel Machiatto would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, an iced grande Caramel Machiatto, would you like to customize this drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have it with low fat milk and extra caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. Anything else you would like to add or change?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, light, regular or extra whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra please, I'm feeling extra creamy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one grande iced caramel machiatto with extra cream. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, would you like to pick it up now or later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll place the order and you can it up in 15 mins at the Starbucks on Montague and River Oaks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure. I'll send you a notification to make sure you pick up your drink.
